product_name: PowerBar Performance Energy Fruit and Nuts Bar
long_description: Fuel up with the PowerBar Performance Energy Fruit and Nuts Bar. It will help you feel and perform your best when playing, training or competing at the highest levels of intensity and duration. Bar is formulated with a 2:1 glucose to fructose blend, found to deliver 20 - 50% more energy to muscles than glucose alone. Blend of proteins and nutrients helps you prepare for intense training and high-endurance athletic competition. Combine with a carb-based meal 2 - 4 hours before exercise or consume as a snack 30 - 60 minutes before exercise. Consume 1 or 2 PowerBar Performance Energy Fruit and Nuts Bars per hour during exercise that lasts over an hour. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Fuel up with the PowerBar Performance Energy Fruit and Nuts Bar. It will help you feel and perform your best when playing, training or competing at the highest levels of intensity and duration.
